amendment.description: An amendment numbered 70 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to prohibit the Small Business Administration from using the new affiliation and lending criteria for the 7(a) lending program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meuser amendment (A040) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Meuser amendment (A040) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Meuser amendment (A040) Agreed to by voice vote.
